message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm asking for $22,000.  What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $22,000 is already a very competitive price for what this product offers.  To make this work, I can come down to $19,000. I believe this is a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $17,500. I'm really interested in this product, but I need to be able to justify the cost to my team.
